control

Class ClientConnectionController

  • java.lang.Object
    • ocsf.client.AbstractClient
      • control.ClientConnectionController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class ClientConnectionController
extends AbstractClient
    ClientConnectionController create instance to client, and presave into ClientController with static variable for communication later with the GUI and clients.
    Author:
    nire

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static boolean canContinue
      Get true after receiving values from DB.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ClientConnectionController(java.lang.String host, int port)
      ClientConnectionController constructor initialize the hostname, and then the port for establish connection to server. it also open new connection physically for it.
